verbose_text: In insulin dependent diabetes mellitus (IDDM), signaling of TNF-alpha via TNFR1 was shown by one group to contribute to beta cell toxicity while another showed that administration of TNF-alpha delayed the onset and decreased the severity of IDDM.
evidence: TNF-alpha via TNFR1 was shown by one group to contribute to beta cell toxicity               while another showed that administration of TNF-alpha delayed the onset and decreased the severity of IDDM
